name: Play and Learn with Josephine
summary: This game starts in Josephine’s room where you can click on almost everything. If you click on the door you can play tag with Josephine’s friends. In the bookshelf you find coaster car racing and letter games. You can play memory, jigsaw and a lot more. Almost every game has a high score list, so you can compete against yourself or your friends. You can choose a difficulty level that suits the moment and skill.
